casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Monte M. POTTER. No. 99P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of February 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-31(B)(1)(2)(3)(4)":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
